response.overview: Wealthy slacker college student Mark, his new girlfriend Sarah, and their friends are invited to a special showing at a mysterious wax museum which displays 18 of the most evil men of all time. After his ex-girlfriend and another friend disappear, Mark becomes suspicious.
response.tagline: Stop on by and give afterlife a try.
response.title: Waxwork

titles.title: Waxwork - Reise zurück in der Zeit
Waxwork - Benvenuti al museo delle cere
Waxwork - Il museo delle cere è arrivato in città
